elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: What are social networks?
elements.correctAnswer: Connecting people in analog and digital form

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What advantage do analog social networks have over digital ones?
elements.correctAnswer: In analog social networks, contacts are direct and personal.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What advantage do digital social networks have over analog ones?
elements.correctAnswer: Digital social networks allow you to communicate with many people around the world.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which digital social networks are relevant for your profession? Name three portals.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What shapes a person's personality? Name five influencing factors.
elements.correctAnswer: Family, school, circle of friends, profession, clubs, religion, political system, mass media, social background, gender
